roleset.name: presenting signs of, indicating

example.name: symptomatic-j: both args
example.text: This latest decision is symptomatic of that resistance but economic events will ultimately decide whether " resistance is futile " .

example.name: symptomatic-j
example.text: Mr. Tracy Burnett was symptomatic for several years with changes to his bowel habit
example.arg: with changes to his bowel habit
example.amr: (s / symptomatic-01 :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Mr." :op2 "Tracy" :op3 "Burnett")) :ARG2 (c / change-01 :pl + :ARG1 (h / habit-01 :ARG1 p :ARG3 (a2 / anatomical-site :name (n2 / name :op1 "bowel") :part-of p))) :duration (s2 / several :op1 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1 :unit (y / year))))
